name: shopify-theme-resources
title: Shopify Theme Resources
description: Quickly reference and search Shopify theme resources, like input settings, fonts, and more for Shopify theme development.
author: trpage_dev

commands.name: index
commands.title: Shopify Theme Resources
commands.subtitle: Shopify Theme Development
commands.description: Quick access to necessary Shopify theme resources, like input settings, fonts, and more.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
